result.purpose: Contains static files and assets for the React.js portfolio website.
result.architecture: The folder follows a static file architecture pattern, serving essential assets and configuration files for the web application.

public/index.html.purpose: Defines the structure and metadata for a React.js portfolio website.
side_effects: Requires JavaScript to be enabled for the app to function.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if URLs are not properly secured.

public/manifest.json.purpose: Defines the web app manifest for a React application.

public/robots.txt.purpose: specifies rules for web crawlers and bots regarding which parts of the site should not be accessed
